name: Thoth-Hermes (Hermes Trismegistus)
shortLoreBlurb: Thoth-Hermes (Hermes Trismegistus) is a deity/sync. from Egypt (Greco-Egyptian) associated with wisdom, alchemy, writing.
description: Thoth-Hermes (Hermes Trismegistus) is a deity/sync. from Egypt (Greco-Egyptian) associated with wisdom, alchemy, writing.
